name: garden days daisy bag
notes:
crochet this stunning tote bag bursting with bright daisies! 32 granny squares and 8 triangles are seamed together to form this functional bag that you will love bringing to the market, to the library and on all your outings!

the free pattern can be found **[here][1]**!

note that the 15 page pdf contains the step-by-step pictures and detailed instructions on how to assemble the bag.

i used three different shades of 24/7 cotton (worsted weight level 4) : bay leaf (3 skeins), ecru (1 skein) and goldenrod (1 skein). to see different color combinations and for inspiration for your own bag, check out my video **[here][2]** as i worked up different granny squares using all the shades of 24/7 cotton yarn currently available!

i have a full video tutorial on my blog and on youtube that demonstrates how to crochet the granny square, granny triangle, how to seam the pieces together and crochet the top edging and strap. you can find this video **[here][3]**!

to instantly add zipper closure and compartments, you can fit a large size bag organizer into this bag (comes in different colors and patterns). you can find the bag organizer link in my blog post!


  [1]: https://www.allaboutami.com/garden-days-daisy-bag/
